price: اور (اے نبی یہ بھی کہہ دو) کہ اگر لوگ راه راست پر سیدھے رہتے تو یقیناً ہم انہیں بہت وافر پانی پلاتے.
arabic: وَأَلَّوِ ٱسۡتَقَٰمُواْ عَلَى ٱلطَّرِيقَةِ لَأَسۡقَيۡنَٰهُم مَّآءً غَدَقٗا

version.title: Urdu Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Urdu by Muhammad Ibrahim Gunakry. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-allawi is'taqāmū ʿalā al-ṭarīqati la-asqaynāhum māan ghadaqan
translations: surely We (would) have given them to drink
